title: Europe Tried to Limit Mass Layoffs, but the Cuts Are Coming Anyway
description: Despite furlough schemes that have kept tens of millions of people employed, a tsunami of job cuts is about to hit as companies downsize.
dc:creator: Liz Alderman
media:credit: Felix Schmitt for The New York Times
media:description: A Lufthansa jet in Frankfurt. The airline is cutting 22,000 jobs.
